summary: Chloroform, also known as trichloromethane (TCM), is a colorless, sweet-smelling liquid used as a solvent. It was once a popular anesthetic but is no longer used for that purpose. Chloroform is made in large amounts to create refrigerants and a type of plastic called PTFE. It can mix with many other solvents but doesn't dissolve well in water.
title: Chloroform
